item.title: Legacy plans can now update to credit-based plans
item.description: 🚀 Legacy pricing accounts can keep their current plans without any changes. However, there’s an option to switch to new credit-based plans if desired. 🔍 Explore updated pricing and learn about the credit system. Use the pricing calculator to estimate costs effectively. 💬 For further questions, refer to the legacy plans FAQ or contact support. #PricingUpdate #CreditBasedPlans #CustomerSupport

item.title: Netlify pricing update: Introducing credit-based plans
item.description: 🚀 Netlify has introduced credit-based plans for new accounts, simplifying pricing for better transparency. Current users can remain on their legacy plans, with options to switch soon. The new system uses a single credit balance instead of multiple metrics. 🔍 Three plans are now available: - Free: 300 credits, $0 - Personal: 1,000 credits, $9/month - Pro: 5,000 credits, $20/member/month Additional credits can be purchased as needed, and costs remain predictable. item.title: Security Update: Multiple vulnerabilities in Next.js
item.description: 🚨 Security Alert for Next.js Users 🚨 Recent vulnerabilities have been disclosed affecting Next.js applications, including issues related to arbitrary file downloads and cache poisoning. Netlify’s engineering team confirms that sites hosted on their platform are not vulnerable to multiple threats. However, if using the next/image component with protected sources, caution is advised.
